message.body: Hey. You still going tonight? What time do you get home from work?
I actually won't get home till 6, but since I've been out in the rain all day (cause we decided to be idiots and go to the park instead), I need to shower. Who's Scott? Do I want a ride with him?
It's Steve's brother.
Ohhhhhhh.
Phuong probably won't be on time if you want to wait for her.
Huh. I don't know.
I'll ask her if she minds leaving a little later. I'll get home at 545 so maybe I can shower really quick and see if she can come at like 615
Ok
You won't go with Sam, will you?
Haha. I just texted Michael. Oh God. 40 minutes parking with Sam. I don't know.
Cassy might be going. I'm waiting for Michael to respond.
And just so you know since we might see her tonight. Her dad died Sunday morning. The day before her birthday.
I remember you saying that, and I figured with the rain, it'd be worse
OH MY GOD that's horrible!!!
I know. It's really sad.
Everyone is dying! Maddie's mom told me today that someone she knew died yesterday. Jeez.
I knew he was sick in the hospital a few months ago but he's been home. Michael never knew for sure what was wrong with him.
Gotcha. Although at this point, I don't even know if I want to go anymore.
Too much of a headache.
I know. This is confusing.
But just come! You don't have work tomorrow and you never get to see anyone.
Yeah. I probably will. I figure I won't see anyone this weekend cause I'll be in DC
Yup
Figure out who you're going with?
Sam
Oh. I conned myself to go with her too.
Well conned Sam I guess?
Haha.
Yeahhhhh
Sam just showed up in the car to get us. Were sent her to you but I know you just got home. And Michael has work to do before he leaves and failed to tell anyone this. Ugh!
Sorry to make you wait. I didn't know he had work.
It's okay!
He's almost done. You can come around now.
Okay.
